title: Hermes Publicatoion
content:
im after the name of the font in under the logo, also bonus points for what the logo font is

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415183902im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Screen%20Shot%202015-03-08%20at%208_3650.20.11%20pm.png)
author: Gemma53

comments.content:
Hermes websites use Raleway as a thin sans.  
Don

Memphis Medium is close to the logo.  
Previous discussion [http://typophile.com/node/104817](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415183902/http:/typophile.com/node/104817 "http://typophile.com/node/104817")  
Don

Here is a link to an eps outline of an older version of the Hermes logo [http://www.brandsoftheworld.com/logo/hermes-0](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415183902/http:/www.brandsoftheworld.com/logo/hermes-0 "http://www.brandsoftheworld.com/logo/hermes-0")  
Needless to say this is a registered trademark and use for anything other than examination of the design, without the express permission of the copyright and/or trademark holder, would raise legal issues.  
Don
The typeface for “Is pleased to invite you…” is Gill Sans Light.
